Text:
BBS, can you please share this book? "Never Check E-Mail In the Morning: And Other Unexpected Strategies for Making Your Work Life Work"
ISBN-10: 0743250885
ISBN-13: 978-0743250887

I was hoping The Amateur by Edward Klein would be on the list, but it looks like I'll have to wait a bit longer.

Thank you for the upload.

@creativethinker

I don't have this book on hand ,but I will see if I can get it.I'm not sure I can ,I will try :)

There are a couple of books that should have been on the list ,but I haven't got them yet.Eventually I will get your book and upload it :)
